sqlMap.select: SELECT t.CUST_ORG_NO, t.CUST_ORG_NAME, t.UNIT_ID, t.UNIT_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00003' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_ALL_INFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00004' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_SPECIAL_INFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00034' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_ALL_OUTFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00035' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_SPECIAL_OUTFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00067' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_ALL_NETFLOW FROM ( SELECT c.CUST_ORG_NO, c.CUST_ORG_NAME, c.CUST_ORG_TYPE, c.CUST_LEVEL, u.UNIT_ID, u.UNIT_NAME, q.TAR_CODE, q.TAR_VALUE FROM PFM_CUST_ORG c LEFT JOIN PFM_TM_QTY_CUST_ORG q ON q.CUST_ID = c.CUST_ORG_NO AND q.TAR_CODE IN ('TE_00003', 'TE_00004', 'TE_00034', 'TE_00035', 'TE_00067' ) AND q.ORG_ID = #unitId# and q.TAR_DATE = #dataDate# LEFT JOIN SYS_UNIT u ON u.UNIT_ID = q.ORG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND c.CUST_ORG_NO in ('100000','100001','100002','100003','100004','100005','100007','100018','100028','100030','100050','100055') )t GROUP BY t.CUST_ORG_NO,t.CUST_ORG_NAME,t.UNIT_ID,t.UNIT_NAME ORDER BY t.CUST_ORG_TYPE,t.CUST_LEVEL

SELECT DISTINCT d.TAR_CODE, d.TAR_NAME, q.TAR_VALUE FROM PFM_TM_QTY_DEF d LEFT JOIN PFM_TM_QTY_ORG q ON d.TAR_CODE = q.TAR_CODE AND q.ORG_ID = #unitId# and q.TAR_DATE = #dataDate# WHERE d.TAR_STATUS = '1' and d.TAR_CODE IN ('TE_00011', 'TE_00012', 'TE_00013', 'TE_00117', 'TE_00043', 'TE_00044', 'TE_00045', 'TE_00118', 'TE_00110', 'TE_00111', 'TE_00112', 'TE_00113')
